'''Chiseled sandstone''' is a decorative variant of [[sandstone]], crafted from [[sandstone slab]]s.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Chiseled sandstone can be mined with any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, the [[block]] drops nothing.
{{breaking row
|horizontal=1
|Chiseled Sandstone
|Pickaxe
|Wood
|link=none
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Chiseled sandstone can generate in [[desert pyramid]]s, warm [[ocean ruin]]s and [[trial chambers]].

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|B2=Sandstone Slab
|B3=Sandstone Slab
|Output=Chiseled Sandstone
|type=Building block
}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
|Sandstone
|Chiseled Sandstone
}}

== Usage ==
Unlike [[sand]], chiseled sandstone is never affected by [[gravity]].

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage|Chiseled Sandstone}}

=== Note blocks ===
Chiseled sandstone can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
